initial_question.title: Detailed Training Configurations
initial_question.body:
The work is awesome and thank you for open-source!  I’m interested in training the model from scratch and could you please provide some instructions on the following:

Training Configurations:
- What optimizer and hyper parameters (learning rate, batch size, etc.) were used?
- How many steps were trained?  
- For Slat VAE-gs/raidanceField/flexicubes, how many views is used per object per training step? 

Thank you so much!

satisfaction_conditions: Training configuration parameters must be fully specified
Training duration must be defined for each model component
View configuration per object during training must be specified
